LineNo: 16037777,

Narrator: The loud whistle of the ship's depa...
en


The loud whistle of the ship's departure pulled you out of your thoughts.\n\nYou went upstairs to the upper deck to watch what used to be your home slowly disappear in the horizon.\n\nYou...

LineNo: 16037895,

Player_Romus: ...vowed to yourself that you would...
en


...vowed to yourself that you would be back no matter what.

LineNo: 16037997,

Player_Romus: A new beginning was just around the...
en


A new beginning was just around the corner.

LineNo: 16038099,

Player_Romus: ...grieved the loss of your positio...
en


...grieved the loss of your position and power.

LineNo: 16038201,

Player_Romus: ...decided to look ahead to your fu...
en


...decided to look ahead to your future instead of the past.

LineNo: 16038303,

Narrator: The captain came to the upper deck...
en


The captain came to the upper deck to pull down the Rizian flag to replace it with the Kyrutian flag.\n\nYou had entered Kyrutian waters.

LineNo: 16038309,

Narrator: The captain came to the upper deck...
Menu Text en


1957|Republic of Kyrute

LineNo: 16038411,

Player_Romus: It was a new beginning.
en


It was a new beginning.

LineNo: 16038513,

Narrator: A beautiful island and an extraordi...
en


A beautiful island and an extraordinary mansion with multiple servants awaited you.\n\nThey unpacked your belongings. You went out to the balcony and took in the view.\n\nYou thought...

LineNo: 16038639,

Player_Romus: ...maybe this was not going to be s...
en


...maybe this was not going to be so bad after all.

LineNo: 16038741,

Player_Romus: ...nothing could fill the hole left...
en


...nothing could fill the hole left in your heart.

LineNo: 16038843,

Player_Romus: ...you should take it easy for a wh...
en


...you should take it easy for a while.

LineNo: 16039223,

Narrator: The captain came to the upper deck...
en


The captain came to the upper deck to pull down the Rizian flag to replace it with the Rumburgian flag.\n\nYou had entered Rumburgian waters.

LineNo: 16039229,

Narrator: The captain came to the upper deck...
Menu Text en


1957|Kingdom of Rumburg

LineNo: 16040173,

Narrator: When you arrived in Rumburg, a prof...
en


When you arrived in Rumburg, a profound feeling of relief and regret washed over you. You wondered if you could ever be allowed back into Rizia again.\n\nThanks to Queen Beatrice's kindness, you were given one of the seven palaces of the Livingstons in Thornborough.

LineNo: 16040179,

Narrator: When you arrived in Rumburg, a prof...
Menu Text en


1957|Kingdom of Rumburg

LineNo: 16040567,

en


It was a new beginning.

en


You tried to organize a resistance in Rizia from Kyrute.

en


It was a new beginning.

You tried to organize a resistance in Rizia from Thornborough.

en


A new beginning was just around the corner.

LineNo: 16041547,

Narrator: Despite your best attempts, you cou...
en


Despite your best attempts, you couldn't manage to marshall your remaining loyalists from such a distance.\n\nSeveral days later you received the news of the Rizian Revolutionary Committee's declaration of the abolishment of the Rizian monarchy.

LineNo: 16042761,

Narrator: Despite your best attempts, you cou...
en


Despite your best attempts, you couldn't manage to marshall your last remaining loyalists from such a distance.\n\nSeveral days later you received the news of Hugo's coronation in Porte Drazon. Rizia had a new king.

LineNo: 16042863,

Narrator: Despite your best attempts, you cou...
en


Despite your best attempts, you couldn't manage to marshall your last remaining loyalists from such a distance.\n\nSeveral days later you received the news of Rico's coronation in Porte Drazon. Rizia had a new king.

LineNo: 16042965,

Narrator: Despite your best attempts, you cou...
en


Despite your best attempts, you couldn't manage to marshall your last remaining loyalists from such a distance.\n\nSeveral days later you received the news of Lucita's coronation in Porte Drazon. Rizia had a new queen.

LineNo: 16043067,

Narrator: Despite your best attempts, you cou...
en


Despite your best attempts, you couldn't manage to marshall your last remaining loyalists from such a distance.\n\nSeveral days later you received the news of Taddeus' crowning in Porte Drazon. Rizia had a new king.

LineNo: 16043169,

Narrator: Despite your best attempts, you cou...
en


Despite your best attempts, you couldn't manage to marshall your last remaining loyalists from such a distance.\n\nSeveral days later you received the news of Angelica's coronation in Porte Drazon. Rizia had a new queen.

LineNo: 16043271,

Player_Romus: You couldn't believe it.
en


You couldn't believe it.

LineNo: 16043651,

Narrator: Several days later you received the...
en


Several days later you received the news of the Rizian Revolutionary Committee's declaration of the abolishment of the Rizian monarchy.

LineNo: 16044865,

Narrator: Several days later you received the...
en


Several days later you received the news of Rico's crowning in Porte Drazon. \n\nRizia had a new king.

LineNo: 16044967,

en


Several days later you received the news of Lucita's crowning in Porte Drazon. \n\nRizia had a new queen.

en


Several days later you received the news of Taddeus' crowning in Porte Drazon. \n\nRizia had a new king.

en


Several days later you received the news of Angelica's crowning in Porte Drazon. Rizia had a new queen.

LineNo: 16045273,

en


Several days later you received the news of Hugo's crowning in Porte Drazon. \n\nRizia had a new king.

LineNo: 16045375,

Player_Romus: You couldn't believe it.
en


You couldn't believe it.

LineNo: 16045573,

Narrator: When you arrived in Rumburg, a prof...
en


When you arrived in Rumburg, a profound feeling of relief and regret washed over you.\n\nThanks to Queen Beatrice's kindness, you were given one of the seven palaces of the Livingstons in Thornborough.\n\nYour servants unpacked your belongings. Everything felt somewhat foreign, yet also similar.\n\nYou thought...

LineNo: 16045699,

Player_Romus: ...you would not stay here forever.
en


...you would not stay here forever.

LineNo: 16046175,

Narrator: Several days later you received the...
en


Several days later you received the news of Angelica Sazon's swift government takeover in your absence.\n\nThey had declared her the new Queen of Rizia.

LineNo: 16047111,

Narrator: Several days later you received the...
en


Several days later you received the news of Lucita Azaro's swift government takeover in your absence.\n\nThey had declared her the new Queen of Rizia.

LineNo: 16047491,

Narrator: Several days later you received the...
en


Several days later you received the news of Taddeus Azaro's swift government takeover in your absence.\n\nThey had declared him the new King of Rizia.

LineNo: 16047593,

Narrator: Several days later you received the...
en


Several days later you received the news of Hugo's swift government takeover in your absence.\n\nThey had declared him the new King of Rizia.

LineNo: 16047695,

Narrator: Several days later you received the...
en


Several days later you received the news of Rico's swift government takeover in your absence.\n\nThey had declared him the new King of Rizia.

LineNo: 16048277,

Narrator: Several days later you received the...
en


Several days later you received the news of the Rizian Revolutionary Committee's swift government takeover in your absence.\n\nThey had declared the abolishment of the Rizian monarchy.

LineNo: 16048379,

Player_Romus: You couldn't believe it.
en


You couldn't believe it.

LineNo: 16051291,

Narrator: When you arrived in Rumburg, a prof...
en


When you arrived in Rumburg, a profound feeling of relief and regret washed over you. You wondered if you could ever be allowed back into Rizia again.\n\nThanks to Queen Beatrice's kindness, you were given one of the seven palaces of the Livingstons in Thornborough. \n\nYour mother, Vina and Pabel were already waiting for you there.

1957|Republic of Kyrute

LineNo: 16054687,

Narrator: A few days later your mother made i...
en


A few days later your mother made it out from the country and joined you in Rumburg. She was overjoyed to see you again.\n\nShe said that your remaining personal assets had been seized before she was allowed to leave.

LineNo: 16055067,

Narrator: A few days later your mother and Vi...
en


A few days later your mother and Vina also made it out of the country and joined you in Rumburg. They were overjoyed to see you again.\n\nThey said that your remaining personal assets had been seized before they were allowed to leave.

LineNo: 16055543,

Player_Romus: You were happy to see them.
en


You were happy to see them.

LineNo: 16055645,

Player_Romus: You worried about the future.
en


You worried about the future.

LineNo: 16055747,

Player_Romus: You were happy to see her.
en


You were happy to see her.

LineNo: 16056127,

Narrator: A few days later, Vina made it out...
en


A few days later, Vina made it out from the country and joined you in Rumburg. She was overjoyed to see you again.\n\nShe said that your remaining personal assets had been seized before she was allowed to leave.

LineNo: 16056733,

Narrator: Together with {RiziaDLCText.ExiledT...
en


Together with {RiziaDLCText.ExiledTogether}, you did your best to get used to the intricacies of Rumburgian culture and court politics, but it proved to be particularly difficult.\n\nYour ties to Queen Beatrice were making you a target of the local nobility.\n\nYou...

LineNo: 16057495,

Narrator: Together with {RiziaDLCText.ExiledT...
en


Together with {RiziaDLCText.ExiledTogether}, you did your best to get used to a new life in Kyrute, but it proved to be more difficult than expected.\n\nYour noble status did not mean much here, and almost all of your wealth has been seized in Rizia. You couldn't afford to live in the same way you've been living.\n\nYou...

LineNo: 16057907,

Narrator: Together with {RiziaDLCText.ExiledT...
en


Together with {RiziaDLCText.ExiledTogether}, you did your best to get used to a new life in Kyrute. but it proved to be more difficult than expected, as your noble status did not mean much here.\n\nHowever, thanks to your mother transferring some of your wealth, you could afford to live in the same luxury you did.\n\nYou...

LineNo: 16058049,

Player_Romus: ...continued to live like royalty.
en


...continued to live like royalty.

LineNo: 16058151,

Player_Romus: ...decided to distance yourself fro...
en


...decided to distance yourself from Rumburgian politics.

LineNo: 16058253,

Player_Romus: ...became directly involved in poli...
en


...became directly involved in politics in support of your sister-in-law.

LineNo: 16058633,

Narrator: You received a call from Vina. She...
en


You received a call from Vina. She had been trying to reach out to you for days.\n\nThough Rizia and Pales were now unified, Axel had managed to make a deal with the new government. Pales was able to maintain some degree of autonomy. The Royal Family could take refuge there.\n\nAs the Grand Duchess, Vina invited you to come live with her. You...

LineNo: 16058743,

Player_Romus: ...agreed and moved to Pales with y...
en


...agreed and moved to Pales with your family.

LineNo: 16058845,

Player_Romus: ...told her it was too dangerous fo...
en


...told her it was too dangerous for you to be in Pales because of Rizia's proximity and influence.

LineNo: 16058947,

Narrator: Together with {RiziaDLCText.ExiledT...
en


Together with {RiziaDLCText.ExiledTogether}, you moved to the capital of Pales.\n\nAxel and Vina did their best to ensure your safe arrival and even gave you a luxurious estate by the Palesian coast. Despite everything, you were now together with your family.\n\nYou...

LineNo: 16058953,

Narrator: Together with {RiziaDLCText.ExiledT...
Menu Text en


1957|Grand Duchy of Pales

LineNo: 16061403,

Player_Romus: ...formed Romus Toras Foundation to...
en


...formed Romus Toras Foundation to help international refugees.

LineNo: 16061505,

Player_Romus: ...tried to use your family name to...
en


...tried to use your family name to become a celebrity in Kyrute.

LineNo: 16061607,

Player_Romus: ...offered your services to the All...
en


...offered your services to the Alliance of Nations.

LineNo: 16061709,

Player_Romus: ...offered your help to Axel in the...
en


...offered your help to Axel in the Palesian government.

LineNo: 16061811,

Player_Romus: ...kept your distance from Palesian...
en


...kept your distance from Palesian politics.

LineNo: 16061913,

Narrator: Over the next years, despite not fe...
en


Over the next years, despite not feeling at home, you got used to life in Rumburg.\n\nYou had access to almost everything money could buy. You enjoyed special privileges due to your ties to the queen. There was not much to complain about.

LineNo: 16061919,

Narrator: Over the next years, despite not fe...
Menu Text en


1960|Kingdom of Rumburg

LineNo: 16062021,

Narrator: Over the next years, you found your...
en


Over the next years, you found yourself deep inside Rumburgian court politics. While hesitant at first, Beatrice grew to rely on you more and more as you helped her shepherd through important palace businesses.\n\nOne day, she assigned you a critical job to crush the democratic opposition in the city of Glenhill, which became a bastion of the Rumburgian anti-monarchists. She offered you the Duchy if you succeed.\n\nYou...

LineNo: 16062027,

Narrator: Over the next years, you found your...
Menu Text en


1960|Kingdom of Rumburg

LineNo: 16062511,

Narrator: Over the next months, you found you...
en


Over the next months, you found yourself deep inside Rumburgian court politics. While hesitant at first, Beatrice grew to rely on you more and more as you helped her shepherd through important palace businesses.\n\nShe told you about her plans of "the Grand Awakening." The long awaited war with Sordland was about to begin.

LineNo: 16062517,

Narrator: Over the next months, you found you...
Menu Text en


1957|Kingdom of Rumburg

LineNo: 16062897,

Player_Romus: The army was ready.
en


The army was ready.

LineNo: 16062999,

Player_Romus: But Sordland attacked first.
en


But Sordland attacked first.

LineNo: 16063101,

Narrator: Over the next months, the relations...
en


Over the next months, the relationship between Sordland and Rumburg deteriorated drastically. The Rumburgian army was deployed to the southern border.

LineNo: 16063107,

Narrator: Over the next months, the relations...
Menu Text en


1957|Kingdom of Rumburg

LineNo: 16063487,

Player_Romus: You were worried.
en


You were worried.

LineNo: 16063589,

Player_Romus: But Sordland attacked first.
en


But Sordland attacked first.

LineNo: 16063691,

Player_Romus: ...declined the assignment.
en


...declined the assignment.

LineNo: 16063793,

Player_Romus: ...did your best to deliver.
en


...did your best to deliver.

LineNo: 16063895,

Narrator: Axel declined your request and insi...
en


Axel declined your request and insisted that you should stay outside of politics. \n\nGetting used to Pales was more difficult than what you expected. However, here you could afford to live in the same luxury you did.\n\n{RiziaDLCText.AfterBirthOfYourSon}

LineNo: 16063997,

Narrator: A few days later your mother, Vina...
en


A few days later your mother, Vina and Lucita made it out of Rizia and joined you in Rumburg. They were overjoyed to see you again.\n\nThey said that your remaining personal assets had been seized before they were allowed to leave.

LineNo: 16064655,

Narrator: A few days later, Vina and Lucita m...
en


A few days later, Vina and Lucita made it out from the country and joined you in Rumburg. They were overjoyed to see you again.\n\nThey said that your remaining personal assets had been seized before they were allowed to leave.

LineNo: 16065035,

Narrator: A few days later your mother and Lu...
en


A few days later your mother and Lucita made it out from the country and joined you in Rumburg. They were overjoyed to see you again.\n\nThey said that your remaining personal assets had been seized before they were allowed to leave.

en


A few days later, Lucita made it out from the country and joined you in Rumburg. She was overjoyed to see you again.\n\nShe said that your remaining personal assets had been seized before she was allowed to leave.

Narrator: A few days later your mother made i...
en


A few days later your mother made it out from the country and joined you in Kyrute. She was overjoyed to see you again.\n\nShe said that your remaining personal assets have been seized before she was allowed to leave.

LineNo: 16066591,

Narrator: A few days later your mother and Vi...
en


A few days later your mother and Vina also made it out from the country and joined you in Kyrute. They were overjoyed to see you again.\n\nThey said that your remaining personal assets have been seized before they were allowed to leave.

LineNo: 16066789,

en


You were happy to see them.

en


You worried about the future.

en


You were happy to see her.

en


A few days later, Vina made it out from the country and joined you in Kyrute. She was overjoyed to see you again.\n\nShe said that your remaining personal assets have been seized before she was allowed to leave.

A few days later, Vina and Lucita made it out from the country and joined you in Kyrute. They were overjoyed to see you again.\n\nThey said that your remaining personal assets have been seized before they were allowed to leave.

A few days later your mother and Lucita made it out from the country and joined you in Kyrute. They were overjoyed to see you again.\n\nThey said that your remaining personal assets have been seized before they were allowed to leave.

A few days later your mother, Vina and Lucita made it out from the country and joined you in Kyrute. They were overjoyed to see you again.\n\nThey said that your remaining personal assets have been seized before they were allowed to leave.

LineNo: 16069413,

Narrator: A few days later, Lucita made it ou...
en


A few days later, Lucita made it out from the country and joined you in Kyrute. She was overjoyed to see you again.\n\nShe said that your remaining personal assets have been seized before she was allowed to leave.

LineNo: 16070001,

Narrator: After your embrace, you realized Lu...
en


After your embrace, you realized Lucita was pregnant.\n\nShe was carrying your child.

LineNo: 16070111,

Player_Romus: You feared for your heir's safety.
en


You feared for your heir's safety.

LineNo: 16070213,

Player_Romus: You were happy that you were going...
en


You were happy that you were going to be a father.

LineNo: 16070411,

Player_Romus: ...founded a company focused on tra...
en


...founded a company focused on trading Rizian goods.

LineNo: 16071053,

Player_Romus: ...join the Wruhecist Sanctuary of...
en


...join the Wruhecist Sanctuary of Konstantium.

LineNo: 16071155,

Player_Romus: ...tried your luck showing your com...
en


...tried your luck showing your comedy skills in Kyrutean cabarets.

LineNo: 16071257,

Player_Romus: ...sold the jewelries and other val...
en


...sold the jewelries and other valuables of your family.

LineNo: 16071359,

Narrator: You used your money and influence t...
en


You used your money and influence to help the international refugees through the Romus Toras Association.\n\nAfter your massive donations, the organization started to gain some traction at Konstantium. You were slowly being invited into the circles of the Kyrutean elite.\n\n{RiziaDLCText.AfterBirthOfYourSon}

LineNo: 16071365,

Narrator: You used your money and influence t...
Menu Text en


1958|Grand Duchy of Pales

LineNo: 16071841,

Narrator: You used your money and connections...
en


You used your money and connections to importing Rizian goods to Kyrute. \n\nAfter your initial successes, your business started to gain some traction at Konstantium. You were slowly being invited into the circles of the Kyrutean elite.\n\n{RiziaDLCText.AfterBirthOfYourSon}

You tried to use your name and connections to increase your media presence.\n\nHowever, other than being invited to a debate program in a local TV channel, you didn't get many opportunities.\n\n{RiziaDLCText.AfterBirthOfYourSon}

en


You sold whatever valuable item you could find. Despite not many, you managed to earn a couple million.\n\n{RiziaDLCText.AfterBirthOfYourSon}

LineNo: 16072557,

Narrator: You sold whatever valuable item you...
Menu Text en


1958|Grand Duchy of Pales

LineNo: 16072659,

Narrator: You gave yourself to God and joined...
en


You gave yourself to God and joined the service of the Sanctuary in Konstantium.\n\n{RiziaDLCText.AfterBirthOfYourSon}

LineNo: 16072665,

Narrator: You gave yourself to God and joined...
Menu Text en


1958|Grand Duchy of Pales

LineNo: 16072767,

Narrator: After going on a few successful sho...
en


After going on a few successful shows, the Kyrutean nightlife started to demand more of your comedy.\n\nUsing your stories as king in your jokes, you quickly became a popular comedian in Konstantium.\n\n{RiziaDLCText.AfterBirthOfYourSon}

LineNo: 16072773,

Narrator: After going on a few successful sho...
Menu Text en


1958|Grand Duchy of Pales

LineNo: 16072875,

Player_Romus: Long live the new prince of Rizia.
en


Long live the new prince of Rizia.

LineNo: 16072977,

Player_Romus: Years passed.
en


Years passed.

LineNo: 16073079,

Narrator: Months later, Lucita gave birth to...

When the Sordish Armed Forces entered the city, they started to unleash their vengeance on the Rummish nobility in the capital.\n\nWhen they finally got to your house, the soldiers couldn't identify who you were. Despite their orders to arrest Livingston's family, they charged you with death.
